trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> controls.
The `ImageListArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ImageList` array.
It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref> class.

When you instantiate an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref> class, specifying its container.

When you instantiate an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> where the control array will be hosted.
Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref>.
The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> control.
if target is a member of the control array; otherwise .
Overrides <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.GetControlInstanceType*>.
This method cannot be called from your application's code.
Use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method instead.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
The <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <xref uid="langword_csharp_Protected" name="Protected" href=""></xref> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
Gets the index of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> in an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref>.
This method can be used to retrieve the index for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> in the control array.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that represents the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
Overrides <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.HookUpControlEvents*>.
This method cannot be called from your application's code.
Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref:System.Object>.
Gets a specific element of an <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref> by index.
Read-only.
The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.

```vb# MsgBox(CStr(ImageListArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(ImageListArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that specifies the position of an element of the control array.
An at the specified Index in the control array.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResetIndex" name="ResetIndex" href=""></xref> method is not supported in the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref> class.
This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
Sets the index of the initial <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref>.
The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> in the control array.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref> that represents the index of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> is a member of this <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray"></xref>.
If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ImageListArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.

> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref> in the control array.
if o is a member of this control array; otherwise, .
